string-array.name: performance_setting_resize_mode
string-array.item: Only if image is too big

resources.string: If you have encountered an error, but weren\'t able to report the error at the time (or you simply want to add a personal note on the matter), you can send me an email directly by clicking the link below.

I will read any error reports I receive, so please enter as many details as you can. eg. If you encountered a problem while reading an image/archive, sending me information about the file, such as its size, format, etc. (or the file itself) would help tremendously.

By default, JComic will include the make and model of your device, the version of Android you are running, and the version of JComic you are using. You are free to remove these details if you don\'t want to include them, but the Android and JComic versions in particular are very useful when debugging.

Enjoying this app? Let me know what you think by rating and/or reviewing JComic.
Encountered problems? Please send an error report instead and help me improve JComic.
